"Make a list of everything that needs to be done today, from the most important task to the least important one. Prioritize them based on their urgency and importance and allocate time accordingly."
"Use natural cues like the position of the sun or the wind direction to determine the start and end of the day."
"Create a system of marking different events on a piece of paper or board to keep track of the time."
"Set up a series of alarms or notifications throughout the day to remind you of important tasks or appointments."
"Work in short bursts of productivity followed by brief breaks to recharge and refresh."
